website_summaries.verdict: An excellent value for the money. Kit includes phone mount for photo capture and compact tripod.
pros: It's hard to criticize a waterproof, fogproof, shockproof monocular with high magnification that's as cheap as this
cons: Description claims night vision, which it is not
Optics chosen for price rather than quality

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy 🙁
customer_reviews.text: I like the monocular fits my hand perfectly. Unfortunately the tripod mount 1/4 screw socket is PLASTIC❓❓ 🤔. NO NOT PLASTIC!!️ Yep threads stripped the second time I put it on my tripod, I have numerous other items that are attached to a tripod, so I KNOW how this system works... NOT HAPPY 🙁😡🙁. Too bad this looked Iike it could have been a promising birding tool 🙁 Additionally I cannot find a link to contact the seller? 🤔🙄
customer_reviews.author: Jay F.

customer_reviews.title: Works better then $100 scope
customer_reviews.text: So my mom has been spying on the neighbors who have been acting weird in their little tool shed, so as a joke I bought her Thai scope so she can see better, but this is no joke!!! This scope works better then my gun sight. So now instead of spying in the crappy neighbor guy we now spy on nature ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Alee

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and quality
customer_reviews.text: The bracket and the attachments are plastic, not strong enough so that leaves the lens dangling. For a long range zoom this will make the image burry. The lens can only utilize a small area of your camera image sensor so you will only be able to take low resolution pictures. About the 1/5 of what your phone’s original resolution.
customer_reviews.author: WatchLover

customer_reviews.title: Great little telescope
customer_reviews.text: Great little telescope, having a lot of fun observing moon, stars, great for outdoors, gives very crisp image, easy to focus. Very nice feature of the sight adjustment for eyeglasses wearers! Includes a very good quality tripod and a band to keep the telescope secure around the wrist. Includes cell phone mount to make photos through the telescope, easily adjustable for any type of phone, holds tight. Made some great pictures with it! Recommended for anybody to throw a little more fun into outdoors hikes and observing the nature!
customer_reviews.author: Antidot

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Just doesn't work, plain and simple, that is unless you want your pictures to have a look of taking picture through a keyhole. I'll chalk this up to lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick D

customer_reviews.title: Wishfull thinking
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea and that is why I invested in it. That being said I was dissappointed, the focus was never quit right, the adapter for the phone not secure, It dropped the phone three different times before I gave up. In total I would not recommend it though I wish i could.
customer_reviews.author: Wm

customer_reviews.title: Gonna take some time to get results
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult for the telescope retaining cap to maintain contact with phone. When I pre-focused the telescope and attached to the phone bracket, the image displayed required more work.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great compact Binos for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get a compact binoculars for hiking and bird watching. This one is perfect. It is small, lightweight and yet give clear image from far away. It can be folded to fit my kids as well.
customer_reviews.author: YZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Monocular, I just love it its working great with my Iphone and also fit on my friend samsung. the zoom is great, pictures that i took was pretty clear. it is not heavy and it is easy to cary with you to anywhere you go, I will definitely recommend to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: TOMER MEIR

customer_reviews.title: poor fitting mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install so that the telescope would stay close to the phone camera. You'd have to manually hold them together, or use tape. poor fitting mechanism. Object needs to be under plenty of light to view. Tripod is very flimsy and does not look anything like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: VRCdude

customer_reviews.title: The delivery was very good, on time
customer_reviews.text: Fitting to the cellular did not work very well One if the screws is too small and the brackets don't fit properly. The instuction are incomplete. The lenses work as expected. The delivery was very good, on time.
customer_reviews.author: nestor chavez

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clarity is fine, but the magnification is nowhere near what they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jones

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: It's fun for the kids to look out my 40 foot high attic windows over the New England hills.
customer_reviews.author: L8N8

customer_reviews.title: Cheap prism
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and light weight of these monoculars. Nice and easy to attach your cell phone also. The problem is very cheap prism inside. Only about 1/4 of what you see is clear. All around the sides it looks cloudy and blurry. Not all clear like the photos show. Would not recommend for anyone that wants to use it with a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love to keep this handy. It works well, with ease. I get dizzy with binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: Sioux

customer_reviews.title: I like it, works best if you have a Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it, works best if you have a Bluetooth shutter control and a 50" tripod, but the threads that hook up to the tripod are made of plastic so be careful :)
customer_reviews.author: john babitsch

customer_reviews.title: NO NIGHT VISION
customer_reviews.text: It says it has night vision BUT IT DOESNT ITS A FUGAZI CAPPICE!!! I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Wilmer D. Santana

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Does not pull images in close enough. Almost impossible to set the little tripod up. Cheap. May be ok for golf tournaments or close bird watching but not a go to idem for much of anything. Wish I had just bought a nicer monocular.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Grey

customer_reviews.title: Texture is nice
customer_reviews.text: The optics are sharp, the focus is easy to adjust. The image showed through the lens is clear and brings a textured feel. Texture is nice, especially it's tiny and easy to bring with.
customer_reviews.author: shizi

customer_reviews.title: its ok for bird watching
customer_reviews.text: it does ok in the day time but for anything at night nope it has a nice mounting for a cell phone to use the camera
customer_reviews.author: ronald flart

customer_reviews.title: Safe to use and cool
customer_reviews.text: Not only fancy but also very practical. I used to have a metal pod to sharp the knife and cut myself once. This one I don't need to worry about this kind of accident any more cuz those slots can retain the knife in the safe zone. And it looks so much cooler than the old cheap pod.
customer_reviews.author: Shuai Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Power is worse than not using them
customer_reviews.text: Power is worse than not using them.don't even try the phone adapter don't work just magnifies a small circle.sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Perryman

customer_reviews.title: Stop! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids, no loss when they lose them. Poor quality optics. Camera mount is a joke, tripod is a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, easy to install and can be used on cellphones, so I can take pictures everywhere because it is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Deng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s a amazing experience. I can see super cleaner on the mountin. I feel like I am a sniper.
customer_reviews.author: Yang Yu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with a Samsung 8 or 8+
customer_reviews.text: This does not work with a Samsung 8 or 8+ ! I will return it as soon as I can. The camera holder is very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: This monocular is amazing i used it the first time in my outing ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery!!This monocular is amazing i used it the first time in my outing to a lake with family!!i enjoyed the clear view of many birds and insects!!The kids Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Taha raul

customer_reviews.title: Useful for different occasions
customer_reviews.text: Useful for different occasions .. I ordered it to watch the full moon and it was fun using this device ..
customer_reviews.author: Luffy

customer_reviews.title: ... guy can take you close to whatever you want~ Easy to use when hang out with my friends
customer_reviews.text: This cute guy can take you close to whatever you want~ Easy to use when hang out with my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Daonan Shen

customer_reviews.title: Good value binocular.
customer_reviews.text: Very usable as a binoculars, and not bad zoom lens for cp camera.
customer_reviews.author: GA Travel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Looks too good to be true? That’s because it is. Terrible optics! Phone clip is not good either.
customer_reviews.author: sinnaever

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but it takes some effort getting the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, but it takes some effort getting the phone centered on the lens for a good picture. Once in place, takes good pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really nice monocular telescope
customer_reviews.text: It is so interesting, really nice monocular telescope! It is very good to use with my phone, and it is very clear. Waterproof is great for my outdoor activities, and the holder is stable and can take a perfect picture. The product is light and easy to carry with a rope.Good buy and price was competitive. High recommendation!!!
customer_reviews.author: wan

customer_reviews.title: Love this smart phone monocular
customer_reviews.text: Love this smart phone monocular, it helps me shooting photos from far range. It is really useful when you dont have a camera but you want to record the beautiful sense. Im also imressed by the quality of the product, it is indeed very good, can handle different kinds of situation or even at extreme conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Jiasheng TONG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my hiking trips
customer_reviews.text: Feels very durable and solid. Perfect for my hiking trips!
customer_reviews.author: L T

customer_reviews.title: If ya want quality spend the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Poor optics only 4x at best ya get what ya pay for 2stars from doots 46
customer_reviews.author: david rager

customer_reviews.title: Very clear views and easy to use/ focus
customer_reviews.text: Very clear views and easy to use/ focus. Light weight with handy stand to position camera in a fixed view point. It comes with a cleaning cloth and extra lens adaptor. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Bin Zheng

customer_reviews.title: It came so quickly and works great. I have no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Here is a comparison of with and without the lens, its so clear I couldn't believe it! It came so quickly and works great. I have no complaints, it looks sleek, had all the parts, and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly M

customer_reviews.title: Great Monocular long rage HD ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: Great Monoscope ! Perfect for beginners, I purchase this item to look at airplanes landing near my house and it works wonders ! Anxious for upcoming full month to try them ! The Monocular is very well made, it’s made of hard material but safe And soft to the touch, thumbs up for that. ! Also comes with a phone adapter as a bonus didn’t really used it but tried once and it was simple to attach, the stand is magnificent not only to keep up standing but holding with your hand while watching !! Great buy !!
customer_reviews.author: Alex daniells

customer_reviews.title: Funny!! Recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I have taken my monocular to my workplace, we have tried to use a professional camer aadapter to connect the monocular, it is perfect!! Then, we adjust the zoom and take photos, that’s so clear and beaty! It's completely beyond our expectations! Some of my collegues want to buy, they are interested in it. METALBAY MONOCULAR is perfect!! METALBAY High Power Monocular Telescope 12×50 Waterproof Monocular Scope with Tripod Smartphone Holder, HD Wide Angle BK7 Prism Scope, Low Light Night Vision for Bird Watching Hunting Hiking Outdoor. I taken home and my kid like it very much, which can a tool gift for him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to line up with your phone lens. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to line up with your phone lens. Even more difficult to keep lined up. Works ok as a monocular. But, as a camera lens, it's not worth the effort required.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Even worse than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: how hard is it in the year 2018 to make simple optics that can focus sharply? answer? for METALBAY: impossible
customer_reviews.author: Mudskipper

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, looked used, Parts were missing, so it could not attach to phone. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: I will be returning this item. The Tri pod ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be returning this item. The Tri pod is substandard and does not fit my iPhone 6. The clip is the incorrect one it will not screw into the monocular adaptor. Not what was advertised at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. very useful for my phone
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. very useful for my phone. can hold my iphone and andriod device. also can use the telescope and holder separate
customer_reviews.author: AARON

product_meta.title: METALBAY High Power Monocular Telescope 12×50 Waterproof Monocular Scope with Tripod & Smartphone Holder, HD Wide Angle BK7 Prism Scope, Low Light Night Vision for Bird Watching Hunting Hiking Outdoor
feature_bullets: 【12X50 HIGH POWER MAGNIFICATION】Full 12X magnification and 50mm object lens diameter provides families a clear view of outdoor adventures, allows you discover all small details of outland. Large Field of View (131M/1000M) for Bird, Fishing, Wildlife Watching. Perfect for Hiking, Hunting, Climbing, Scenery and Sightseeing.

【UPDATED TRIPOD】The UPDATED Anti-Slip adapter can hold phone precisely and firmly over the eyepiece for shooting and filming. The NEWEST tripod resists shake and enables hand free viewing. Universal Smartphone Adapter, compatible with Iphone X, 7, 7plus, 6, 6 plus, 6s, 5, 5s, 4s, Samsung GALAXY S6, S6 Edge, S5, Note, LG, Sony, and almost all other smartphones on the market.【UPDATED TRIPOD】The UPDATED Anti-Slip adapter can hold phone precisely and firmly over the eyepiece for shooting and filming

【WATERPROOF & SLIP-ON DESIGN】Waterproof, dust-proof and shockproof design, perfect for any weather or climate. The rubber coat with stripes makes it more comfortable to use and keep it from slipping out of hands.
【ADJUSTABLE EYE CUPS】Adjustable eye cups can be easily and rapidly twisted up and down for optimal viewing with or without glasses. Center focus knob allows you to focus easily with on hand.

【WIDE-ANGLE & HD VIEW】Bak-4 prisms is coated with All-Optical FMC multi-Layer broadband green film, high light transmittance reaches up to 99.5%. Provide you a Wider, Clearer, Brighter view with more pleasant.
